description:
Powder and trail friendly snowshoes. High-carbon steel front crampons provide traction for different terrain types and snow conditions. When you’re climbing up trails, heel riser bars give your calves a break, and the micro-adjustable Boa closure won’t cause pressure points so you can explore a little farther.

  • 6061 T6 aluminum anodized frame is lightweight and sturdy
  • Contoured frame design allows for a natural stride
  • Decking sheds snow well and provides good float surface
  • High carbon steel crampons provide traction uphill and downhill
  • Freeflex pivot provides suspension and rotation on axle for an efficient stride
  • Contact Trek boot harness is flexible even in cold temperatures
  • Boa® Fit System lets you fine-tune the fit
  • Gradient heel riser reduces calf strain while climbing
  • Suitable for powder or on trails
name: Louis Garneau Blizzard III Snowshoes - Women's
